name: Bilimber Pte. Ltd.
description: Developer of social learning application designed to offer solutions for the exams. The company's platform allows to practice, prepare, and connect students to top tutors instantly through a one-on-one live video call.
one_liner: Developer of social learning application designed to offer solutions for the exams. The company's platform allows to practice, prepare, and connect students to top tutors instantly through a one-on-one live video call.
